title: Restore Add User button on Users page

requirements.text: Add an 'Add User' button to the Users page header area (alongside the existing Refresh button). The button should be visible and functional for admin users, opening the existing AddUserInfoDialog when clicked.

quotes: this page inside not showed add user button , please provide add user button

acceptanceCriteria: An 'Add User' button is visible in the Users page header area when logged in as an admin
Clicking the button opens the AddUserInfoDialog (or equivalent user creation dialog)
The button is only shown to users with admin role (role-gated)
No other changes are made to the Users page layout or functionality

constraints: No other changes to the Users page beyond adding the Add User button
Do not modify any immutable frontend paths
Reuse the existing AddUserInfoDialog component â€” do not create a new one
nonGoals: Changing the Users page table layout or columns
Modifying edit or delete user functionality
Any changes to pages other than UsersPage
